subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mike Woodson held Amar’e Stoudemire, Carmelo Anthony, Tyson Chandler and Jason Kidd out of a preseason game against Boston. The Knicks’ starters have yet to play together.
snippet: Mike Woodson held Amar’e Stoudemire, Carmelo Anthony, Tyson Chandler and Jason Kidd out of a preseason game against Boston. The Knicks’ starters have yet to play together.
